name: Dominoes: Board Game
description:
Dominoes is definitely one of the most famous board game in the world. Enjoy this free timeless classic in Draw, Block and All-Five (Muggins) modes.

Draw dominoes: simple, relaxing, play your tiles on either side of the board. You only need to match the tile you have with one of the 2 ends already on the board.

Block Dominoes: A very similar variant that will have you scrambling for solutions – there are no extra tries here – if you can’t figure out your next move, you will have to skip your turn.

Dominoes All Five: If you want a challenge, All Fives is the variant you should go for. Each turn, you need to add all ends of the board, and count the number of pips on them. If it is a multiple of five, you score those points. A bit difficult at first but you will quickly get it!

You can play all these variants with the help of an intuitive user interface that allows you to play one-handed, giving you all the tools you need to learn this deceptively difficult classic board game. What are you waiting for? Take a break, install the game and start placing those tiles!
